flawed_nl_solution:
He made $600.0 mowing yards, $250.0 for his birthday, $150.0 selling items and $150.0 doing odd jobs so he made 600.0+250.0+150.0+150.0 = $<<600.0+250.0+150.0+150.0=1150.0>>1150.0
He made $1150.0 and will save 40% so he saves 1150.0*0.4 = $<<1150.0*0.4=640.0>>640.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 460.0, not 640.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
